title: Big Bar Reaction Ferry
description: Big Bar Reaction Ferry. Travel advisory in effect at Big Bar Reaction Ferry (Big Bar Reaction Ferry). Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only. Next update time Fri May 30, 2025. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 9:13 AM PST. (DBC-70341)
Description: Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge maintenance between Mt Sicker Rd and Fuller Lake Rd for 3.7 km (Chemainus). Lane closures in both directions. Construction speed zone in effect. Southbound bridge closed for repairs. All Traffic diverted onto the adjacent bridge. No overwidth protocols in effect up to 4.4m. Next update time Mon Jan 20, 2025 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 9:22 PM PST. (DBC-70685)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Seasonal shutdown between December 21 and January 14. 80km/hr speed limit. Construction resuming Jan 15, 2025. Next update time Wed Jan 15, 2025 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Dec 20 at 7:34 AM PST. (DBC-64961)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave, Chase, BC
Description: Construction work for 0.7 km. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Seasonal shutdown between December 21 and January 14. 80km/hr speed limit. Construction resuming Jan 15, 2025.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work planned between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous). Starting Tue Jan 7, 2025. From 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Full closure January 7 9am-3pm, single lane alternating traffic 8pm-6am. Next update time Tue Jan 7, 2025 at 5:00 PM PST. Last updated Sat Dec 21 at 10:42 AM PST. (DBC-70490)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous)

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)

title: Highway 37 Both Directions
description: Highway 37, in both directions. Avalanche control work planned between Bell 2 Bridge and Bob Quinn Camp for 47.8 km (Bell II to Bob Quinn). Starting Tue Dec 31 at 11:30 AM PST until Tue Dec 31 at 2:00 PM PST. Expect delays of up to 40 minutes. Next update time Tue Dec 31 at 2:00 PM PST. Last updated Mon Dec 30 at 2:21 PM PST. (DBC-71537)
Location: Highway 37, between Bell 2 Bridge and Bob Quinn Camp for 47.8 km (Bell II to Bob Quinn)

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Mon-Fri essential service Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Sat-Sun Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 9:40PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 10:20PM. Essential service travelers board 1st, then general public. Emergency services accommodated. Next update time Thu Jan 2, 2025 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Dec 30 at 8:26 AM PST. (DBC-69872)

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry. Additional service planned between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Starting Tue Dec 31 at 6:00 AM PST until Wed Jan 1, 2025 at 11:00 PM PST. The Osprey ferry will run on the full winter schedule for December 31st and January 1st. Next update time Wed Jan 1, 2025 at 11:00 PM PST. Last updated Mon Dec 30 at 3:07 PM PST. (DBC-71475)

title: Other Roads
description: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. Landslide at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection. Road closed. A temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road. Next update time Mon Apr 14, 2025 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Dec 9 at 5:50 PM PST. (DBC-23443)
Location: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection
Description: Landslide, road closed. Temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Durrell Road, in both directions. Landslide at 700m from Highway 97. Road closed. Detour in effect. Detour available via Highway 97 and Dale Lake Road. Next update time Wed Apr 23, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 1:06 PM PDT. (DBC-27390)
Location: Durrell Road, in both directions at 700m from Highway 97
Description: Landslide. Road closed. Detour available via Highway 97 and Dale Lake Road.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Quesnel-Hixon Road, in both directions. Landslide at Cottonwood bridge. Road closed. Next update time Thu Apr 17, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 2:46 PM PDT. (DBC-28386)
Description: Landslide at Cottonwood bridge. Road closed.

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)
Location: Johnston Bridge at Front St. in Quesnel
Description: Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: McKay Road, in both directions. Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed. Next update time Thu Apr 10, 2025 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 10 at 9:04 AM PST. (DBC-53013)
Description: Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Cave Road, in both directions. Landslide at Quesnel-Hixon Road. Road closed. Landslide on Cave Road. Next update time Tue Apr 1, 2025 at 10:00 AM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 9 at 10:17 AM PDT. (DBC-67913)
Location: Cave Road, in both directions at Quesnel-Hixon Road
Description: Landslide on Cave Road. Road closed.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Pavilion Clinton Rd, in both directions. Travel advisory in effect between Clinton and Lillooet 60 km south of Lillooet. Road closed for the season. Pavilion-Clinton Rd is closed for the Winter. Next update time Fri May 16, 2025 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 12 at 9:23 AM PST. (DBC-70161)
Location: Pavilion Clinton Rd, between Clinton and Lillooet 60 km south of Lillooet
